PROPOSED SURVEY
a/asq Tfiff
The attached questionnaire is a roughed out proposal designed
to obtain information from all stations using the Network service® It
is intended that this information will be compiled and used by Headquarters
and the program committees to better fill the needs of participating
stations.
Copies of this proposal are being sent to both ths Network Ac¬
ceptance Committee and the In-School Program Committee for their additions
and comments o It will also be checked by Dallas Snythe before it is sent
